turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm starving! What are some good restaurants open near me right now? I'm in downtown Chicago.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay! I see a few options. There's Lou Malnati's Pizzeria (deep dish), RPM Italian, and a Thai place called Brown Bag Seafood Co. All are open and have good ratings. Do any of those sound appealing?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, Italian sounds good, but I'm trying to eat healthy. Anything a bit lighter than pasta?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! RPM Italian does offer several lighter options like grilled fish and salads. Alternatively, Brown Bag Seafood Co. has grilled fish, poke bowls, and salads, which might be more directly aligned with your goals.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, Brown Bag Seafood Co. it is. Can you see what their most popular item is?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Based on recent orders and reviews, the 'Market Catch' seems to be a popular choice. It allows you to select your type of fish and preparation style.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: That sounds complicated. What's the *most* popular fish they serve grilled? It's important. I've had bad experiences before.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am showing that Salmon is the most frequently ordered fish grilled. Many users have mentioned enjoying it with the 'Secret Sauce'.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Great! Add the grilled salmon with secret sauce to my cart and deliver it to my current address. Thanks, you've been a big help!
